abstract: A day after naming 70 executives to its elite partnership, Goldman Sachs has promoted 266 to managing director, the next rung down from partner.
snippet: A day after naming 70 executives to its elite partnership, Goldman Sachs has promoted 266 to managing director, the next rung down from partner.
lead_paragraph: A day after naming 70 executives to its elite partnership, Goldman Sachs has promoted 266 to managing director, the next rung down from partner. Last year, the firm named 261 executives to managing director.
